text: Na'ankure maka vahe'ma rankumapima mani avitene'zama kegekege'ma hu'za vanoma nehaza zana atre'za fresnageno, vahe kugoa origahie. Onagamu mesga hu'nege'za mani'neza kuma kegava nehaza none, kini vahe nomo'a amne meno haviza hanigeno, tonki afutamimo'za muse nehu'za anampina vano nehanageno, sipisipi afu'mo'za anampina vano hu'za trazana negahaze.
